item.title: By: Kim Bridge
item.dc:creator: Kim Bridge
item.description:
Hi Roger,
This is Kim Bridge do you know of anyhow I can get ahold of your sister Erica.
Kim
item.content:encoded:
Hi Roger,

This is Kim Bridge do you know of anyhow I can get ahold of your sister Erica.

Kim

item.title: By: roger baird
item.dc:creator: roger baird
item.description: Hey there Joseph, I found this web blog just now and wanted to wish you a happy new year- I had a good one here at the south pole- send me your email and I'll send you some pics- it was good to see you and sara at my dad's funeral- roger out
item.content:encoded:
Hey there Joseph, I found this web blog just now and wanted to wish you a happy new year-
I had a good one here at the south pole-
send me your email and I’ll send you some pics-
it was good to see you and sara at my dad’s funeral-
roger out
